original_title: Union Station is different  — The Donald
article_summary: Union Station in DC is praised for improved safety and cleanliness, credited to President Trump's deployment of the National Guard. Discussions ensue about addressing paid protesters and defending the border, with varying suggestions. A personal anecdote shares a positive encounter with a black Uber driver expressing support for Trump. The article suggests a growing support for Trump among diverse groups, despite mainstream media portrayals.</s>
